document_data.name: Thutai
document_data.mainbody: '''Thutai''' was a [[Red Wizard of Thay]] overseer in the [[Doomvault]] dungeon in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Thutai cared little for his underlings. If a fight went bad for him, he always tried to escape.
